title: About Us
fluense: FLUENSE is a platform that connects influencers and companies, enabling them to collaborate and achieve mutual success.
mission: Our goal is to facilitate collaboration between influencers and companies, creating space for creativity and innovation.
for_whom: FLUENSE is here for all influencers who want to expand their brand and for companies looking for new and effective ways to promote.
how_it_works: Simply register, connect your social networks, and start searching for collaboration opportunities with companies looking for influencers like you!

faq.benefits: What benefits do I have as an influencer?
faq.commission: What is the commission from the collaboration?
faq.collaboration: How can I establish collaboration with a company?
